Kakarot.shortDescription: EVM interpreter written in Cairo, a sort of ZK-EVM emulator, leveraging STARK proof system.
Kakarot.longDescription: Kakarot is an Ethereum Virtual Machine written in Cairo. It means it can be deployed on StarkNet, a layer 2 scaling solution for Ethereum, and run any EVM bytecode program. Hence, Kakarot can be used to run Ethereum smart contracts on StarkNet. Kakarot is the super sayajin zkEVM! Why? Because: It's over 9000!!!!!.
